headline: Bio-Techne Announces Exosome Diagnostics Divestiture
summary: Bio-Techne Corporation (NASDAQ: TECH) today announced an agreement where Mdxhealth SA will acquire its Exosome Diagnostics Inc. business, including the ExoDx Prostate (EPI) test, CLIA-certified clinical laboratory and related assets. Bio-Techne will retain access to the proprietary exosome-based technology for ongoing kit development in its precision diagnostics growth pillar.

raw.headline: Bio-Techne Announces Exosome Diagnostics Divestiture

Bio-Techne will retain access to the proprietary exosome-based technology for ongoing kit development in its precision diagnostics growth pillar.

headline: ScaleReady Announces a G-Rex® Grant has been awarded to Sidra Medicine
summary: ScaleReady, in collaboration with Wilson Wolf Manufacturing, Bio-Techne Corporation and CellReady, today announced that Sidra Medicine, a women and children's hospital in Qatar, has been awarded a $100,000 G-Rex® Grant. Sidra Medicine's G-Rex® Grant will enable expeditious development, validation, and implementation of a G-Rex® centric CAR-T cell production platform.
